text:
In a win for #languageaccess, @VDHgov has announced a new service for #Deaf & hard of hearing Virginians who use #AmericanSignLanguage (#ASL). Virginia is the first state to provide real-time ASL support for #COVID19 and #vaccine information. 

Read more: https://t.co/qUYZwXq5Zn https://t.co/3mccuRjg2y
